subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Paying due homage to Sesame Street, our star of the day, Alex Ovechkin, is not a Muppet but probably should be, just for being the most kid-in-a-candy-store-exuberant player in sports.
snippet: Paying due homage to Sesame Street, our star of the day, Alex Ovechkin, is not a Muppet but probably should be, just for being the most kid-in-a-candy-store-exuberant player in sports.
